location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Camp Rohut [Rohat] to Colonel John Allen Wright

mods.abstract: Letter urging Wright to undertake the work in his jurisdiction on the settlement of boundaries and requesting that Lieutenant Yate proceed to Minbahera [Nīmbāhera] to undertake boundary work there once finished his current work as the Political Agent there has gone on medical leave.The letter also discusses correspondence with Mr Franjee Bickajee on his boundary work and requesting that Wright arrange a programme of work so that it can be undertaken.
